title: Private Full-Day Best of Lima Tour
description: Seeing all of the top attractions in bustling, sprawling Lima in one day is challenging. This private full-day tour fits in all the top attractions, including the Monastery of San Francisco (a UNESCO World Heritage Site) and the Larco Museum—entrance fees included. Your guide offers insight into centuries of colonial history as you travel by air-conditioned vehicle through historic Miraflores and take in views from Morro Solar.
all_descriptions: Seeing all of the top attractions in bustling, sprawling Lima in one day is challenging. This private full-day tour fits in all the top attractions, including the Monastery of San Francisco (a UNESCO World Heritage Site) and the Larco Museum—entrance fees included. Your guide offers insight into centuries of colonial history as you travel by air-conditioned vehicle through historic Miraflores and take in views from Morro Solar.

Your private guide picks you up at your centrally located Lima hotel to begin your tour in an air-conditioned car or minivan. 

Drive past historic squares and ornate churches, and listen as your guide sheds light on Lima’s colorful history. Stroll along grand boulevards for up-close views of the colonial architecture, and explore the UNESCO–listed Monastery of San Francisco. On your 1-hour guided tour of the monastery, visit the second largest library in Latin America and ancient catacombs.

Next, stop at Larco Museum—built atop a seventh-century pyramid and home to a vast collection of pre-Columbian art. Explore the gardens and galleries with your guide. 

After lunch (own expense), climb the Morro Solar—a hill by the ocean, offering views over Chorrillos Bay.

Visit the Huaca Pucllana—a pre-Incan pyramid—and perhaps stop at the Inca Market for souvenirs. Then, take in the Parque de Amor on route back to your Lima accommodation.

reviews.title: Great private tour of Lima
reviews.text: Maricarmen was our guide and Jorge our driver.  We had a lovely time in Lima.  I would thoroughly recommend this tour!  As well as visiting the sites listed in the itinerary, we had a great lunch at a very nice restaurant.

reviews.title: Perfect day exploring Lima
reviews.text: Nathaly was our guide and Jorge, our driver.  We had the most amazing time.  Both Nathaly and Jorge were extremely knowledgeable, friendly, and helpful.  I am quite confident I would not have been able to cover as much of Lima on our own.  My favorites were the Larco museum & the view from Morro Solar.  They answered all of our questions and were extremely flexible.

reviews.title: Perfect full day in Lima
reviews.text: Mily and George were great guides! They were informative, friendly, and kind. We all enjoyed our full day Lima tour before heading back home on a late-night flight. The tour was the perfect way to see a lot of Lima all in one day.

reviews.title: Fantastic day in Lima
reviews.text: My husband and I had a fantastic experience. Our guide (Milagros) was very knowledgeable and made our day a great adventure! Our driver, Jorge,  was amazing and super accommodating.

reviews.title: Gorgeous city of Lima  with amazing history and architecture !
reviews.text: Spent the day touring the beautiful  city of Lima with amazing history, culture, and architecture! Thanks to Mariacarmen and our driver Ismael which were really the highlights of making our day of adventure so memorable ! Thank you mi Amiga y Amigo

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.text: We had one day in Lima and the tour took us everywhere we wanted to go.  Our tour guide, Nathaly, was amazing.  Her immense knowledge of the city history and architecture was wonderful.  At the museum Larco she was able to really go through the history of Peru using the artifacts that gave a great understanding of the country’s past.  I wouldn’t have gotten nearly as much out of it on my own.  Our driver, Jorge, was absolutely lovely.  I highly recommend this tour!

reviews.title: An Incredible Experience from Start to Finish
reviews.text: This tour was truly unforgettable! Everything was perfectly organized, relaxing, and fun from the moment we were picked up. Our driver, Coqui, made us feel safe and comfortable the whole day, and Charo, our tour guide, was simply amazing-so warm, knowledgeable, and passionate. The whole experience felt special and personalized, and we couldn't have asked for a better team. Highly recommend this tour to anyone looking to make the most out of their time and walk away with great memories!

reviews.title: Great Tour
reviews.text: We had an amazing tour in Lima.  We saw most of the major sights.  Our tour guide was so friendly and knowledgeable as was our driver.  I highly recommend this tour.

reviews.title: Exceptional all day  tour experience of Lima
reviews.text: One of the most professional tour companies we have worked with impressed us right from the start with their clear and responsive communication, especially with our tour guide, Lourdes, and our driver, Koki. Lourdes picked us up on time at our hotel and guided us on an entire day of touring Lima. As it was our first visit to the city, this all-day tour provided us with an exceptional opportunity to experience everything Lima has to offer.The small details can really enhance your experience, and upon arrival, we were amazed at how spotless and comfortable the van was—it felt like it had just been purchased. Koki took great pride in maintaining the van and navigated the complex streets of Lima with professionalism. He was always ready to pick us up and safely transport us to our next destination.Lourdes’s extensive knowledge and genuine concern for our comfort made a significant difference in our experience. She had even reserved a table for us at the Museo Larco—a stunning venue for lunch or dinner. We grew so close to both Lourdes and Koki that we invited them to be our guests for lunch, and they shared even more insight into Lima and Peru, particularly about the delicacies on the menu.We were sad to see our time with them come to an end, and we highly recommend Integrity Tours, along with our tour guide, Lourdes, and driver, Koki.

reviews.title: Soo beautiful Lima!!💕
reviews.text: Veryyy interesting tour!! We learn a lot about peruvian history and culture!!! Gabby did an amazing job explaining everything about her country!! We love her!! Also our driver Jorge did an awesome job!! We totally recommeded this tour.
